# GitHub access token, see https://github.com/settings/tokens
github.token=

# Output directory for generated files
outputDirectory=

# GitHub user to get data from 
github.user=projekt-opal

# GitHub topic to filter main repositories
github.topic=opal

# Set execution modes. Available modes are:
# clearCache     Deletes cache files
# deliverables   Creates backup of deliverables at OPAL website
# documentation  Generates documentation
# readme         Creates README.md file for OPAL doc
modes=deliverables,documentation,readme
